replies.body: Thanks for listening; we're glad you're enjoying it so much!
keep it up dude. My phone is full of Riot's music and this became the latest addition

> [{quoted}](name=Talondor,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=I8cuUspe,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-07-23T17:22:44.983+0000)
>
> Thanks for listening; we're glad you're enjoying it so much!

Can you please try to say what kind of genre is this composition, or give some compositors who makes something like this?

This should be part of an album called Songs of Ionia!

I adore Asian themes like this! cant say which one is better this or Irelia's theme! i think most would say Irelia but i cant decide!

Thanks for listening; glad you enjoyed it! :) I personally love Scherzo's Irelia theme & while they are both different champions (and have different music that represents their individual personalities), some of the overarching ideas in Irelia's music certainly influenced the way I approached Akali's music.

Yes! I feel like, it clearly shows that Irelia and Akali are from the same Roots and homeland but they are still very different people. 

This is very well done. Great job Talondor.
Was this played during her trailer?

> [{quoted}](name=Chromatic Eagle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=I8cuUspe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-20T20:05:54.662+0000)

> Was this played during her trailer?

Yes.
